page.title: 12CASTLE BYTHAM'S TOP20 BOOKS
page.content: 1.James and the Giant Peach. 2.Danny the Champion of the World. 3.The B.F.G. 4.Charlie and the Chocolate Factory. 5.Charlie and the Great Glass Elevator All by Roald Dahl. 6.Stig of the Dump. Clive King. 7.Star Wars. 8.The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe C. Day_Lewis. 9.The Iron Man. Ted Hughes. 10.The Call of the Wild. Jack London. 11.The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole. Sue Townsend. 12.The Secret Of Nimh.Robert C O'Brian 13.Superdog.David Henry Wilson 14.Seaview. 15.Hound Of The Baskervilles .Conan Doyle
